trans-unit.source: Identifies the various parts of a selection adorner on an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在标识选择装饰器的各个部分<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.HitTestSelection%2A> method returns an InkCanvasSelectionHitResult to indicate which part of the selection adorner intersects or surrounds a <xref:System.Windows.Point>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.HitTestSelection%2A>方法返回 InkCanvasSelectionHitResult 以指示选择装饰器的哪一部分相交或包围<xref:System.Windows.Point>.</xref:System.Windows.Point> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.HitTestSelection%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when performing drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 执行拖放操作时，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # 此类通常不在 XAML 中使用 XAML 文本用法。

trans-unit.source: The lower middle handle of the selection adorner.
trans-unit.target: 选择装饰器较低中间句柄。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The lower left handle of the selection adorner.
trans-unit.target: 选择装饰器左下方控点。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The lower right handle of the selection adorner.
trans-unit.target: 选择装饰器右下方控点。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The middle handle on the left edge of the selection adorner.
trans-unit.target: 选择装饰器的左边缘中间句柄。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: No part of the selection adorner.
trans-unit.target: 选择装饰器的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The middle handle on the right edge of the selection adorner.
trans-unit.target: 选择装饰器的右边缘中间的控点。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The area within the bounds of the selection adorner.
trans-unit.target: 选择装饰器的边界内的区域。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The upper middle handle of the selection adorner.
trans-unit.target: 选择装饰器上部中间句柄。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The upper left handle of the selection adorner.
trans-unit.target: 选择装饰器左上方控点。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The upper right handle of the selection adorner.
trans-unit.target: 选择装饰器右上方控点。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
